item.title: For tomcat benchmark testing
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: Tomcat Configuration 查看一下可以配置的参数设置JVM的参数Setting JVM Options for TomcatEdit the /usr/locat/apache-tomcat/bin/catalina.sh file and add the JVM options to the JAVA_OPTS environment variable.JVM Option Value Description-Xmx 4g The maximum Java heap size.-Xms 4g The initial Java heap size.-Xmn 1g The size of young generation.-XX:+UseParallelGC – To use parallel
